update video

vauthor = #{vauthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

filter_c = #{filterC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filter_d = #{filterD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update video set vtitle = #{vtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vauthor = #{vauthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vsummary = #{vsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vurl = #{vurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vprice = #{vprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filter_a = #{filterA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filter_b = #{filterB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filter_c = #{filterC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filter_d = #{filterD,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
